ygData.subject: Re: Into the Swamps

** Carnage continued on her way, feeling a few spatters of cold clean water 
as a slight rain began to trickle down from the skies above. She wondered 
slightly if she could make it back to the swamps before the eye of the storm 
came, and she doubted it.
This particular storm would last a solid day or two before the eye came and 
they would have sunshine and blue skies, then there would be more of the 
rain as the remainder of the storm passed by.
But Carnage had always loved the smell of wet earth, plus it was welcome 
after a long and hot day sunning.
Carnage glanced over to Teltoli and chuckled as she hard her, wondering just 
how she could ever think that her swamp smelled bad. But she'de lived in it 
for years, so it was a welcome scent by now and had no stench to it.**
" Yes, I still live there."
** She continued on her way, occasionally slowing in order to make sure that 
her bleeding prey didn't fall from her back and onto the ground. She had 
enough to wash besides dirt.
But Carnage nodded to Teltoli.**
" How could I ever forget? Rude slagging bugger if you ask me! But I think 
that her name was Cyber...um...........Claw or something to that effect."
** Carnage lifted a brow as Teltoli tried to make herself look more adult 
then she was, and she succeeded...partly. But Carnage knew that she had more 
to learn in order to become a truly accomplished soldier. There were things 
that she would have to learn...that Carnage could teach her.
She wondered slightly if Teltoli would let her do that, teach her. She had 
never done it before but Carnage knew enough that others didn't even know 
could be learned. Things that living a life of...basically carnage...had 
thought her.
Carnage bumped Teltoli with her tail and looked at her.** " You're not all 
THAT grown up yet, girl. You still gotta lot to learn about war and what 
it's all about." ** Carnage gave her a slight smile before looking ahead 
again, then hearing her ramble on about earth and how it was far better then 
Cybertron.
She had to agree with her there, and if she had the choice she was going to 
stay there too. Not go back with anyone if the Beast Wars ever ended...and 
that was no time soon.
But then Carnage shook her head slightly.** " No, it's ok. I've never liked 
walking quietly anyway."
